channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Federal Judge, Warning of ‘Existential Threat’ to Democracy, Resigns

item.title: Trump Officials Push States to ‘Undo’ Work to Send Full SNAP Benefits
item.description: In late-night guidance, the Agriculture Department also threatened financial penalties against states.

item.title: Senators take first step toward reopening the government after historic shutdown
item.description: The Senate voted late Sunday evening on a compromise that could reopen the government following the longest shutdown in history.
